p: In order to evaluate the antifungal activity of the bullfrog oil and the BBE, a broth microdilution assay was performed. This method is an economic and effective approach that allows the determination of the lowest concentration of the tested agents able to inhibit the growth of different yeasts strains completely [ 52]. The DMSO 1% and the BME were used as negative control and did not show antifungal activity against the tested Candida spp.
